values: To chronicle an event means to record it.
The daily newspaper chronicles local and world events.

- n. 编年史
- vt. 将(某事物)载入编年史

时 态:  
chronicled, chronicling, chronicles 

名 词:  
chronicler
a chronological record of important historical events
n. 编年史，年代记；记录
vt. 记录；把…载入编年史
